Html:
Hello,
I have a GMDB cache file with size of 900MB. I want to know if a good method exist to load this file faster, because when i load this file it takes 1min to load it completely. Thanks for your help
what do you mean 'load'? nothing is loaded until needed
Is there command to set path for GMDB file?
Just use the propery CacheLocation e.g.: MainMap.CacheLocation = "c:\\YourPlace\\maps";
